data.horoscope_data: You can relax a little at last! That's what you could be thinking with today's celestial energy. The time is perfect to get ready for the challenges that up to now were just anxieties inside you. If you're thinking clearly today, Capricorn, it's because you have the strength to face your problems. Now that you have your self-confidence back, you might open your heart even wider to someone dear.
